title: verify_email_password_signin
description: Test the /auth/signin endpoint to ensure users can sign in successfully using valid email and password credentials, and handle invalid credentials appropriately.

title: verify_user_account_creation
description: Test the /auth/signup endpoint to verify new user account creation with valid email and password, and validate error handling for invalid or duplicate accounts.

title: verify_google_signin_functionality
description: Test the /auth/google endpoint to confirm users can sign in using Google authentication and handle failures or cancellations gracefully.

title: verify_password_reset_email_sending
description: Test the /auth/reset-password endpoint to ensure password reset emails are sent to valid email addresses and handle invalid or unregistered emails correctly.

title: verify_personal_info_submission
description: Test the /onboarding/personal-info endpoint to verify that personal information including name, age, gender, height, and weight is saved correctly during onboarding.

title: verify_user_fitness_goals_submission
description: Test the /onboarding/goals endpoint to ensure user fitness goals such as primary goal, target weight, workout frequency, and experience level are saved accurately.

title: verify_workout_history_retrieval
description: Test the GET /workouts endpoint to confirm retrieval of user workout history with correct data and pagination if applicable.

title: verify_workout_creation
description: Test the POST /workouts endpoint to validate creation of new workouts with detailed exercise data including sets, reps, weight, and intensity.

title: verify_workout_update_and_deletion
description: Test the PUT and DELETE /workouts/{id} endpoints to ensure workouts can be updated and deleted correctly by workout ID.

title: verify_water_intake_logging
description: Test the POST /water/logs endpoint to verify logging of water intake with amount, source, and timestamp, and validate data accuracy.
